name: Phụng Thanh
about: Experienced Recruiter with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Powerpoint..),Power BI, Power Query, Google sheets, Screening, Management,Data analyst,...

experiences.description:
Building HR reports in Google Data studio (connecting data source from Biqquery with SQL) such as Workforce Analysis, Turn-over Rate Analysis, Cohort Analyst, Retention Rate, Tracking arrears, tracking Termination, Performance, etc
Collect needs, data with relevant departments to build reports
Standardize raw data, Export data according to the request of the departments
Maintaining, and updating HRM systems. 
Update structure on the system such as Working location, change/add job title, change/add departments structure, etc
Carry out transfer related to the region, Line Manager, Internal transfer, Working place, etc

Key responsibilities:

1. Recuitment:
- Advertising, attracting and searching candidates CVs from both internal & external. Composing and posting advert (Facebook, Linkedin, job websites…)
- Searching candidates CVs from recruitment websites. Implementing other interview process (telephone interview, screening, short-listing, Hiring Manager to interview for final decision, Offer, and conduct Orientation Activities for New Employees.)

2. C&B
- Update and track employee records
- Update and ensure the employee information database 
- Follow up the probation evaluation and contract re-signing for employees
- Check the bank account number

3. Report
- Build up and analystic the recruitment reports (Tracking recruitment process, Leadtime, Cost per hire, Recruiter’s performance, new hires, turover rate,…)
- Coordinate with leader to make recruitment budget and staff cost: based on mainpower plans of Departments to get the suite budget.
- Update and manage monthly recruitment costs

4. Admin
- Build up policies, processes, notices related to recruitment, C&B (Employee Referral Policy; Phone allowance policy, 13th salary policy, Recruitment Procedure, Induction process, …)
- Build up guidelines for new employees, instructions for updating bank accounts ... 
- Negotiate with partner (Hiring website, Headhunt...)
- Process payment of recruitment
